New Website Under Construction

Apr 17, 2016 | 1 min

Hey! Thanks for stopping by. I’m currently working on updating my website. I am working with Jekyll to build a blog into my site and update the look and feel to better reflect how I feel about myself 1 year out of college.

In the process I would like to get a better handle on sass and using Github/Git. I’m kind of a noob so it might take a bit to get everything up and running in a way that satisfies me. But, I’m excited about trying something new and being able to add and subtract as I see fit. Any practice using HTML more effectively and managing CSS and sass is good practice for me.

Why Jekyll? I was exposed to Jekyll when I started helping with the Open Austin website. I like that it doesn’t require me to learn PHP or lots of javascript. It also gives me a solid frame with the ability to manipulate elements in way that makes me feel more in control of my site.

Expect some more post from me very soon and check back on my site as I tweak and adjust it.

Also, check out Jekyll for yourself and let me know if you have any tips or tricks for better managing a Jekyll site.
